page.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following functions for use with a Text Control on an Xdialog box.

case.title: .GET_CURSOR()
case.description: Returns the position of the cursor.

case.title: .INSERT_TEXT()
case.description: Inserts the TextString at the position of the cursor.

case.title: .PASTE()
case.description: Inserts the text contents of the Clip Board at the position of the cursor.

case.title: .REPLACE_TEXT()
case.description: Inserts the TextString at the location of the currently selected text.

case.title: .SELECT()
case.description: Highlights text in the text control.

case.title: .SET_CURSOR()
case.description: Sets the location of the cursor and sets focus to the text control.

case.title: .SHOW_CARET()
case.description: Displays the cursor, causing the text box to scroll if it is not currently visible.
